title:
Your application uses PHP to accept and process file uploads.
It fails to upload a file that is 5 MB in size, although upload_max_filesize is set to "10M".
Which of the following configurations could be responsible for this outcome? (Choose 2)

choices.a: The PHP configuration option post_max_size is set to a value that is too small
choices.b: The web server is using an incorrect encoding as part of the HTTP response sent to the client
choices.c: The browser uses an incorrect encoding as part of the HTTP request sent to the server
choices.d: The hidden form field MAX_FILE_SIZE was set to a value that is too small
choices.e: PHP cannot process file uploads larger than 4 MB
